what: Convert words to numbers in multiple languages
title: Convert words to numbers in multiple languages
text: numberize R package convert numbers written English, French Spanish words "zero" "nine hundred ninety nine trillion, nine hundred ninety nine billion, nine hundred ninety nine million, nine hundred ninety nine thousand, nine hundred ninety nine" character string numeric value. numberize developed Centre Mathematical Modelling Infectious Diseases London School Hygiene Tropical Medicine part Epiverse-TRACE program.

title: Convert words to numbers in multiple languages
text: can install development version numberize GitHub :

title: Convert words to numbers in multiple languages
text: examples illustrate current functionality.
code: # numberize a French string numberize("zéro", lang = "fr") #> [1] 0  # numberize a Spanish string numberize("Siete mil quinientos cuarenta y cinco", lang = "es") #> [1] 7545  # numberize the English string "nine hundred and ninety-nine trillion, nine hundred and ninety-nine billion, nine hundred and ninety-nine million, nine hundred and ninety-nine thousand, nine hundred and ninety-nine" # nolint: line_length_linter. formatC(numberize("nine hundred and ninety-nine trillion, nine hundred and ninety-nine billion, nine hundred and ninety-nine million, nine hundred and ninety-nine thousand, nine hundred and ninety-nine"), big.mark = ",", format = "fg") # nolint: line_length_linter. #> [1] "999,999,999,999,999"  # some edge cases numberize("veintiún", lang = "es") #> [1] 21 numberize("veintiuno", lang = "es") #> [1] 21  # convert a vector of written values numberize(   text = c(17, "dix", "soixante-cinq", "deux mille vingt-quatre", NA),   lang = "fr" ) #> [1]   17   10   65 2024   NA

title: Convert words to numbers in multiple languages
text: {numberwang} converts numbers words vice versa. Limitation: English , CRAN. {nombre} converts numerics words. Limitation: English , word number conversion. {english} converts numerics words. Limitation: English , word number conversion. {spanish} converts numbers words vice versa. Limitation: Spanish . numberize released standalone package hope useful R community large. numberize created response data cleaning requirements {cleanepi}.

title: Convert words to numbers in multiple languages
text: package currently experimental, defined RECON software lifecycle.

title: Convert words to numbers in multiple languages

title: Convert words to numbers in multiple languages

title:
Convert a vector string of spelled numbers in a supported language to
its numeric equivalent. — numberize
code: # convert to numbers a scalar numberize("five hundred and thirty eight") #> [1] 538  # convert a vector of values numberize(c("dix", "soixante-cinq", "deux mille vingt-quatre"), lang = "fr") #> [1]   10   65 2024
